properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.allow-unmarshall-type
properties.description: If enabled then the unmarshal type can be specified via the CamelOcsfUnmarshalType header. This should only be enabled when desired to be used.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.collection-type
properties.description: Refers to a custom collection type to lookup in the registry to use. This option should rarely be used, but allows to use different collection types than java.util.Collection based as default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the ocsf data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.object-mapper
properties.description: Lookup and use the existing ObjectMapper with the given id when using Jackson.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.pretty-print
properties.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.unmarshal-type
properties.description: Class name of the OCSF event type to use when unmarshalling. Defaults to OcsfEvent.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.use-default-object-mapper
properties.description: Whether to lookup and use default Jackson ObjectMapper from the registry.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.ocsf.use-list
properties.description: To unmarshal to a List of OCSF events.
